overview:
Property Developer Business Manager Publisher

With an Australian legal degree, Gascoine has concentrated on both commercial and residential real estate development. He has developed property in Australia and New York. He has a New York real estate licence. Being the owner and developer of his developments he has had maximum exposure to the entire development process from financing, government approvals, right through to sales. His company is also active in residential renovations for clients in the greater New York area.

Gascoine has extensive experience in internet and print publishing with an emphasis on advertising sales. He created and ran the publishing company Nexus Research Institute in New York with the flagship medical journal “LifeSciencesBTR” which was sold in 2007.
